rotate_key.description: Has this account rotated it's private/public key?

event_seq_num.description: Sequnece number in a given event handle

Wallet.description: Wallet belongs to a user, used in an App

count.description: Number of events in the event stream.

key.description: The associated globally unique key that is used as the key to the EventStore

get.summary: Get a transaction by version id

400.description: Bad Request. Probably an ill-formed request. See `error` message for details.

429.description: Too many requests. You have either reached the API usage limit allowed to your user and subscription types or the maximum request allowed per client and second.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error happened at the server side when trying to fulfil your request.

404.description: Given address not exists on Libra blockchain.
